title: Time to Take you medication: [Medication Name]
description: It's time to take [Dosage Quantity]-[Medication Name] - ([Dosage Strength]).

title: Missed Medication Dose
description: You missed your scheduled dose of [Medication Name]. Please take it as soon as possible or consult your doctor.

title: New Prescription Added
description: Your doctor has prescribed a new medication: [Medication Name]. Check your medication schedule for details.

title: Medication Dosage Updated
description: Your doctor has adjusted the dosage for [Medication Name]. Please review your updated prescription.

title: Your Caregiver Has Reminded You to Take Medication
description: Your caregiver [Caregiver Name] has reminded you to take [Medication Name] at the scheduled time.

title: Patient Missed a Medication Dose
description: Patient [Patient Name] has missed their scheduled dose of [Medication Name]. Please review their adherence report.

title: Patient Took Their Medication
description: Patient [Patient Name] has successfully taken their medication: [Medication Name].

title: New Diagnosis Recorded
description: You have successfully recorded a new diagnosis for [Patient Name]: [Diagnosis Details].

title: Prescription Updated
description: The prescription for [Patient Name] has been updated. Review and ensure adherence.

title: Caregiver Reported Medication Status
description: The caregiver for [Patient Name] has updated their medication status: [Status Details].

title: Reminder: Ensure [Patient Name] Takes Their Medication
description: It's time for [Patient Name] to take their medication: [Medication Name]. Please ensure they take it.

title: Patient Missed Medication Dose
description: Patient [Patient Name] has missed their medication: [Medication Name]. Consider reminding them or contacting their doctor.

title: New Medication Assigned to [Patient Name]
description: Doctor [Doctor Name] has prescribed a new medication for [Patient Name]: [Medication Name]. Please ensure adherence.

title: Patient Diagnosis Updated
description: Doctor [Doctor Name] has updated the diagnosis for [Patient Name]: [Diagnosis Details].

title: Medication Status Update for [Patient Name]
description: You have successfully submitted a medication status update for [Patient Name]. Doctor will review it shortly.

title: Medication Time for Patients [Patient Name]
description: Reminder: Patients [Patient Name] need to take their scheduled medications now.

title: Upcoming Doctor Appointment
description: Reminder: You have an appointment with [Doctor Name] on [Date & Time]. Please be on time.

title: New Appointment Scheduled
description: A new appointment has been scheduled with [Patient Name] on [Date & Time].

title: Emergency Alert for [Patient Name]
description: Urgent: [Patient Name] has triggered an emergency alert. Please check immediately.

title: Missed Medication Alert for Patient
description: Patient [Patient Name] has missed their medication: [Medication Name]

title: Patient Vitals Update
description: New vitals recorded for patient [Patient Name]
